# Vulpkanin
[color=#FF0000]Vulpkanin are disabled for character creation.[/color]
[color=#66bbff]Vulpkanin can be achieved via the metem machine.[/color]
Vulpkanin are a race of humanoid canine-like beings.
## Ability Differences
- Deal slash damage instead of blunt when punching - Faster at thieving
## Physical Differences
- Can withstand colder environments better - Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic) is toxic - Can eat raw meat
